explanation: [0-0] In front of a window, two cute kittens, one tabby and one white, are lying on the floor, surrounded by colorful building blocks. Both kittens are smiling happily.

[0-2] Then, the scene changes, revealing a large tabby cat, wearing a pink sweater and blue jeans, with a stern expression. The big cat is squatting on the ground, holding a broom, cleaning up the scattered blocks on the floor.
